ARABIC: أَيُشْرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخْلُقُ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do they make things into partner-gods which cannot create anything and are themselves created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they associate those with Him who cannot create a thing, and are themselves created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they associate (with Allah in His divinity) those who can create nothing; rather, they are themselves created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they (the pagans) consider things that do not create anything but are themselves created equal to God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do they (the disbelievers) ascribe (false deities) that which do not create anything, but are themselves created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they attribute as partners to Allah those who created nothing but they themselves are created
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! they associate (with Him) that which does not create any thing, while they are themselves created!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do they associate that which creates nothing and themselves are created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Attribute they as partners to Allah those who created naught, but are themselves created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they associate with Him those who create nothing and are themselves created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Associate they those who cannot create aught and are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they ascribe [to Him] partners that create nothing and have been created themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they indeed ascribe to Him as partners things that can create nothing, but are themselves created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they attribute as partners to Allah those who created nothing but they themselves are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Will they associate that which cannot create a thing while they are created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do they idolize those who create nothing, and are themselves created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do they associate with Him those who create nothing and they are [themselves] created?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:191] Do they associate, with Him, in worship, those who cannot create anything, but are themselves created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Attribute they as partners to Allah those who created naught) or give life, (but are themselves) i.e. these gods (created) carved; created in that they are carved,
